title: it is so constructed as not to interfere under any circumstances with the ventilation of the space o
clause_text: it is so constructed as not to interfere under any circumstances with the ventilation of the space over and under it; no part of it is put to use as a kitchen/sanitary block; it is not closed, so that it could be converted into an unventilated compartment;

source_pdf.text_snippet: it is so constructed as not to interfere under any circumstances with the ventilation of the space over and under it;
